title: Cox's Bazar
content: Cox's Bazar is famous for its long beach, sea waves, and beach resorts. Cheapest tours start at $50/day.

title: Bandarban
content: Bandarban is a beautiful hill district with lush green mountains, waterfalls, and trekking opportunities. Tours start at $60/day.

title: Sundarbans
content: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, famous for its tiger safaris and rich biodiversity.

title: Rangamati
content: Rangamati is a serene hill district in the Chittagong Hill Tracts, known for Kaptai Lake, indigenous cultures, and scenic viewpoints.

title: Khagrachhari
content: Khagrachhari offers beautiful hills, rivers, and waterfalls, making it perfect for short trekking trips and cultural exploration.

title: Sylhet
content: Sylhet is famous for tea gardens, rolling hills, and natural landmarks like Jaflong and Ratargul Swamp Forest.

title: National Parks in Hill Districts
content: Several hill districts including Bandarban, Rangamati, and Khagrachhari host national parks like Sangu Wildlife Sanctuary and Kaptai National Park, offering hiking, wildlife spotting, and picnic areas.
